extends.description: Name of configuration to extend from.

all.description: Whether or not to instrument all files (not just the ones touched by your test suite).

check-coverage.description: Check whether coverage is within thresholds, fail if not

extension.description: List of extensions that nyc should attempt to handle in addition to .js

include.description: List of files to include for coverage.

exclude.description: List of files to exclude for coverage.

reporter.description: The names of custom reporter to show coverage results.

report-dir.description: Where to put the coverage report files.

skip-full.description: Don't show files with 100% statement, branch, and function coverage

temp-dir.description: Directory to output raw coverage information to.
